## IOverrideTheme.InitFontScheme method

Init FontScheme with new object for overriding FontScheme of InheritedTheme.

### Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| InvalidOperationException | Thrown if the FontScheme is already initialized (not null). |
